column2: our server was extremely sweet and helpful. She explained how to order
column4: and was very enthusiastic about everything once she found out it was our first time there. Everything we ordered
column6: lived up to all the hype. I was especially impressed by how fresh/delicious the sashimi was! They also don't overdo the seasoning of raw fish
column7: or put soy sauce on the table to dip unseasoned fish
